channel.title: Stuck at Connecting to Update Server
channel.description: ok, so i have been working on trying to make a server for atleast 8 hours. this is the closest i have gotton, but now i am stuck again. i am using the davidscape source, and when i click on runserver it says "Starting server on port: 43594" and nothing happens. i think that it is supposed to do that, so im using an ip changer in order to play on it. when i type in my server ip, it just gets stuck at connecting to update server. i have the no-ip thing done and all. also, i get an error in the cmd, saying error_game_js5connect. i have tried multiple hours trying to fix this, and i SUCK with p servers. please just bare with me.

item.title: Stuck at Connecting to Update Server
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

the runserver might be corrupted or have a wrong code, im not sure but thats just a guess

Read full topic
item.source: Stuck at Connecting to Update Server

item.title: Stuck at Connecting to Update Server
item.dc:creator: @poledancerz poledancerz
item.description:
@poledancerz wrote:

drubrkletern:

did you put ur ip in the server files? if not try 127.0.0.1, that means no-ip is not the ip being used to access the server

127.0.0.1 did not work. my server ip is polescape.no-ip.biz. im not even really sure what to do with no-ip. all i did was add a host.

Read full topic

item.title: Stuck at Connecting to Update Server
item.dc:creator: @poledancerz poledancerz
item.description:
@poledancerz wrote:

ok, so i have been working on trying to make a server for atleast 8 hours. this is the closest i have gotton, but now i am stuck again.
i am using the davidscape source, and when i click on runserver it says “Starting server on port: 43594” and nothing happens. i think that it is supposed to do that, so im using an ip changer in order to play on it. when i type in my server ip, it just gets stuck at connecting to update server.
i have the no-ip thing done and all. also, i get an error in the cmd, saying error_game_js5connect. i have tried multiple hours trying to fix this, and i SUCK with p servers. please just bare with me.
